message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for $120. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $70?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more like $90. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $75?
I'm not willing to go as low as $75, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $90, so I'll offer it to you for $85. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. Would you be willing to go down to $82?

I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll meet you at $85, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
